about.title: About Me
about.description: Learn more about my background and experience
about.paragraph1: Hello! I am someone with a special passion for programming, currently focusing on developing skills in both Web and App. I love creating digital products that are not only visually appealing but also provide a smooth user experience. With knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, and React Native, I am confident in developing applications from front-end to back-end, using languages such as C#, Python, and database management systems like MySQL, SQL Server and MongoDB.
about.paragraph2: I am always looking for opportunities to explore and apply new technologies while continuously improving my programming skills. Participating in open-source projects and connecting with the developer community helps me learn from those who came before and share my knowledge.
about.paragraph3: If you are looking for a passionate developer proficient in multiple languages and technologies, ready to embrace challenges to develop high-quality digital products, I would be delighted to collaborate with you.
